Counting Nouns in ASL
elena Koulidobrova
January 2018
 

This paper is the first step towards examination of the mass-count distinction in ASL. We find that as predicted by the previous literature (Chierchia 2010, Deal 2017), the countability distinction in ASL, albeit not being immediately visible, is connected to the number marking.
